name: Great Gold Raid
overview: Clever Carusoe must collect all the gold from each of the four levels. Once he picks up a piece of gold he must get back to his home before the time runs out. He can only carry one piece of gold at a time. The guards will speed up and try to chase Carusoe when he picks up the gold. Avoid the guards or he will lose a life. Watch the time, you don't have forever!
